short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and manage AI prompts directly in the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cover Prompt is sidebar extension that lets you add and search within your  collection of AI - art generation prompts. 

What it does?

* Quick Prompt Saving: Add the prompts you like along with thumbnails -- just drag and drop text and images and tag it. 

* Quick Search and Retrieve: Looking for that perfect prompt you used last week? Go to "Browse prompts" and search for keywords or tags.

* Streamlined Workflow: Spend less time managing and more time creating. I believe I made the user interface intuitive and simple.

* Local database: Your data stays stored locally in your browser (no remote connections, simple, private and secure)

Key Features:

* Quick save (drag & drop, copy/paste or load from files) 

* Organize prompts with custom tags for  sorting and categorization.

* Export and Import: for Backup or exchanging database between computers and browsers.
